modName: DarkStar Armor - Bigger Breast Bigger Butt -CBBE-
summary:
A CBBE replacer that leverages the Huge breast size option offered by the CBBE mod.
Stock, Skimpy and Revealing options available
(WIP)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/1603876-1323393918.png[/img]
Replaces the armor skins for the female model with CBBE based armors using the \"Silly Huge\" option. If massive breast isn\'t for you check out the [url=\"http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3007\"]DarkStar Armor - Stock CBBE[/url]

[b]Just a quick note; due to some RL events and the holidays there has been some delays in our work. We havenâ€™t dropped the project but it will be on hold for a bit longer we will post updates as soon as we can. Thank you[/b]

The armors in this mod are based on [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition[/url] mod.

This mod is an active WIP and armors will be added as quickly as I can mod the meshes, if any clipping is noticed please let me know as well as suggesting alterations you might like.

Basic instructions:
Download the Mesh file and install normally i.e. either using Nexus Mod manager or download the archive and pull the Data folder into your root Skyrim folder, note the mesh as it suggest only contains the mesh, the stock textures from the game should work fine or your welcome to use whoever\'s textures you like.

To install skimpy this is just a texture mod so you need to download the Mesh file first then apply the skimpy it will consist of only textures no meshes.

To install revealing same deal its just a texture mod so download the mesh file and use the textures as you see fit.

Current Armors and Cloths included in this modification:
- Nordic Plate Armor

I am posting this WIP starting with a single armor to get an idea of the interest level; fortunetelling the differences in the SillyHuge and Stock body mesh is all in the tits so I am able to take armors built for the stock and fairly easily bump them up to handle the fuller size of the \"SillyHuge\". Note I am aware that there is a bit of clipping on the _0 i.e. when you have your weight slider down I will address that in upcoming patches.

Plan Steps
1) Convert all existing Stock CBBE armors to use the V2 body and create the alternate _1 for the SillyHuge model
2) Clean up clipping issues and prioritize remaining armors/clothes
3) Tighten up armors to maintain as formfitting a style as possible

Just a note: it is coming up on the holidays and so the frequency of patches will be slower than normal for the coming weeks but keep an eye out.
author: Loden DarkStar
